patthana14.14:1.1_0: Sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:2.1_0: Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:2.1_1: Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:2.1_2: Anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.14:3.1_0: Sāsavañca anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
